skills.label: Deploy and manage server images
items: Install the windows deployment services (wds) role
Configure and manage boot, install, and discover images
Update images with patches, hotfixes, and drivers

skills.label: Implement patch management
items: Install and configure the windows server update services (wsus) role
Manage patch management in mixed environments

skills.label: Configure file and disk encryption
items: Manage efs and bitlocker certificates including backup and restore

skills.label: Configure advanced audit policies
items: Implement auditing using group policy and auditpol.exe

skills.label: Configure DNS zones
items: Configure zone and conditional forward storage in active directory

skills.label: Configure DNS records
items: Create and configure dns resource records (rr) including a, aaaa, ptr, soa, ns, srv, cname, and mx records
Configure record options including time to live (ttl) and weight

skills.label: Configure VPN and routing
items: Install and configure the remote access role
Configure remote dial-in settings for users
Configure web application proxy in passthrough mode

label: Configure a Network Policy Server Infrastructure

skills.label: Configure Network Policy Server (NPS)
items: Configure a radius server including radius proxy

skills.label: Configure NPS policies
items: Configure network policies for vpn clients (multilink and bandwidth allocation, ip filters, encryption, ip addressing)

skills.label: Configure service authentication
items: Create and configure group managed service accounts

skills.label: Configure Domain Controllers
items: Transfer and seize operations master roles
Install and configure a read-only domain controller (rodc)

skills.label: Maintain Active Directory
items: Back up active directory and sysvol
Configure and restore objects by using the active directory recycle bin

skills.label: Configure account policies
items: Configure domain and local user password policy settings
Configure and apply password settings objects (psos)

skills.label: Configure Group Policy processing
items: Configure security filtering and wmi filtering
Configure and manage slow-link processing and group policy caching

skills.label: Configure Group Policy settings
items: Configure settings including software installation, folder redirection, scripts, and administrative template settings
Configure property filters for administrative templates

skills.label: Manage Group Policy objects (GPOs)
items: Back up, import, copy, and restore gpos

skills.label: Configure Group Policy Preferences (GPP)
items: Configure gpp settings including printers, network drive mappings, power options, custom registry settings, control panel settings, internet explorer settings, file and folder deployment, and shortcut deployment
